title: Procedure for formally amending the Constitution

content.question: The procedure for formally amending the United States Constitution best illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: The dominance of the national government over the state governments
The dominance of the state governments over the national government
The Founding Fathers’ desire to facilitate rapid constitutional revisions
The Supreme Court’s power to review constitutional amendments
The federal structure of the United States government

content.answer: The federal structure of the United States government

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
